subject: Sporting Goods
Baseball
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: The bat’s knob is slanted on one side, with the raised edge gradually disappearing so that side of the hand rests on a flat surface rather than grinding against the knob during a swing.
snippet: The bat’s knob is slanted on one side, with the raised edge gradually disappearing so that side of the hand rests on a flat surface rather than grinding against the knob during a swing.
